title: Cash Dividend On The Way From Invesco Mortgage Capital Fixed-to-Floating Series B Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Stock - Nasdaq.com
text: On 9/4/19, Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc's 7.75% Fixed-to-Floating Series B Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Stock (Symbol: IVR.PRB) will trade ex-dividend, for its quarterly dividend of $0.4844, payable on 9/27/19. As a percentage of IVR.PRB's recent share price of $27.60, this dividend works out to approximately 1.76%, so look for shares of IVR.PRB to trade 1.76% lower - all else being equal - when IVR.PRB shares open for trading on 9/4/19. On an annualized basis, the current yield is approximately 7.01%, which compares to an average yield of 6.67% in the "Real Estate" preferred stock category, according to  Preferred Stock Channel  .
